document.full_text: a federal appeals court threw out a ruling that the national day of prayer is unconstitutional and ordered that a lawsuit challenging president obama's right to proclaim the day be dismissed.
document.title: midwest: wisconsin: court ruling favors prayer day
lines_and_colors: a federal appeals court threw out a ruling that the national day of prayer is unconstitutional and ordered that a lawsuit challenging president obama's right to proclaim the day be dismissed.
